insert into ${whichTable} ( CMCR_CG_ID, CMCR_CHANGE_ORDER_UID, CMCR_CG_SHELL_CODE,
CMCR_CG_CREATOR,
CMCR_CG_UPDATER, CMCR_CG_RESERVE1, CMCR_CG_RESERVE2, CMCR_CG_RESERVE3, CMCR_CG_RESERVE4, CMCR_CG_RESERVE5, CMCR_CG_RESERVE6, CMCR_CG_RESERVE7, CMCR_CG_RESERVE8, CMCR_SRC_MAIN_CFG, CMCR_SRC_PUID, CMCR_SRC_MODEL_SHELL, CMCR_SRC_COLOR_UID, CMCR_SRC_SHELL_CFG0_PUID, CMCR_SRC_COLOR_IS_MULTIPLY, CMCR_SRC_CREATE_DATE, CMCR_SRC_CREATOR, CMCR_SRC_UPDATE_DATE, CMCR_SRC_UPDATER, CMCR_SRC_CODE_OF_COLOR_MOD, CMCR_SRC_DESC_OF_COLOR_MOD, CMCR_CHANGE_STATUS, CMCR_CG_CREATE_DATE, CMCR_CG_UPDATE_DATE ) select ${seqName}.Nextval, A.* ,sysdate,sysdate from (
select #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrCgVwoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrCgShellCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrCgCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrCgUpdater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrCgReserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrCgReserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrCgReserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrCgReserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrCgReserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrCgReserve6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrCgReserve7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrCgReserve8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrSrcMainCfg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrSrcPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrSrcModelShell,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrSrcColorUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrSrcShellCfg0Puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrSrcColorIsMultiply,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrSrcCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrSrcCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrSrcUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrSrcUpdater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrSrcCodeOfColorMod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzCmcrChange.cmcrSrcDescOfColorMod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{hzCmcrChange.cmcrChangeStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL} from dual
)A

select ${seqName}.Nextval from dual

mapper.update:
update ${whichTable}
CMCR_CHANGE_ORDER_UID = #{cmcrCgVwoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CMCR_CG_SHELL_CODE = #{cmcrCgShellCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_CG_CREATE_DATE = #{cmcrCgCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CMCR_CG_CREATOR = #{cmcrCgCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_CG_UPDATE_DATE = #{cmcrCgUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CMCR_CG_UPDATER = #{cmcrCgUpdater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_CG_RESERVE1 = #{cmcrCgReserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_CG_RESERVE2 = #{cmcrCgReserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_CG_RESERVE3 = #{cmcrCgReserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_CG_RESERVE4 = #{cmcrCgReserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_CG_RESERVE5 = #{cmcrCgReserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_CG_RESERVE6 = #{cmcrCgReserve6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_CG_RESERVE7 = #{cmcrCgReserve7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_CG_RESERVE8 = #{cmcrCgReserve8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_SRC_MAIN_CFG = #{cmcrSrcMainCfg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_SRC_PUID = #{cmcrSrcPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_SRC_MODEL_SHELL = #{cmcrSrcModelShell,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_SRC_COLOR_UID = #{cmcrSrcColorUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_SRC_SHELL_CFG0_PUID = #{cmcrSrcShellCfg0Puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_SRC_COLOR_IS_MULTIPLY = #{cmcrSrcColorIsMultiply,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_SRC_CREATE_DATE = #{cmcrSrcCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CMCR_SRC_CREATOR = #{cmcrSrcCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_SRC_UPDATE_DATE = #{cmcrSrcUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CMCR_SRC_UPDATER = #{cmcrSrcUpdater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_SRC_CODE_OF_COLOR_MOD = #{cmcrSrcCodeOfColorMod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_SRC_DESC_OF_COLOR_MOD = #{cmcrSrcDescOfColorMod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMCR_CHANGE_STATUS = #{cmcrChangeStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where CMCR_CG_ID = #{cmcrCgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update ${whichTable} set CMCR_CHANGE_ORDER_UID = #{cmcrCgVwoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CMCR_CG_SHELL_CODE = #{cmcrCgShellCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_CG_CREATE_DATE = #{cmcrCgCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CMCR_CG_CREATOR = #{cmcrCgCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_CG_UPDATE_DATE = #{cmcrCgUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CMCR_CG_UPDATER = #{cmcrCgUpdater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_CG_RESERVE1 = #{cmcrCgReserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_CG_RESERVE2 = #{cmcrCgReserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_CG_RESERVE3 = #{cmcrCgReserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_CG_RESERVE4 = #{cmcrCgReserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_CG_RESERVE5 = #{cmcrCgReserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_CG_RESERVE6 = #{cmcrCgReserve6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_CG_RESERVE7 = #{cmcrCgReserve7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_CG_RESERVE8 = #{cmcrCgReserve8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_SRC_MAIN_CFG = #{cmcrSrcMainCfg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_SRC_PUID = #{cmcrSrcPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_SRC_MODEL_SHELL = #{cmcrSrcModelShell,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_SRC_COLOR_UID = #{cmcrSrcColorUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_SRC_SHELL_CFG0_PUID = #{cmcrSrcShellCfg0Puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_SRC_COLOR_IS_MULTIPLY = #{cmcrSrcColorIsMultiply,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_SRC_CREATE_DATE = #{cmcrSrcCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CMCR_SRC_CREATOR = #{cmcrSrcCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_SRC_UPDATE_DATE = #{cmcrSrcUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CMCR_SRC_UPDATER = #{cmcrSrcUpdater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_SRC_CODE_OF_COLOR_MOD = #{cmcrSrcCodeOfColorMod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_SRC_DESC_OF_COLOR_MOD = #{cmcrSrcDescOfColorMod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMCR_CHANGE_STATUS = #{cmcrChangeStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where CMCR_CG_ID = #{cmcrCgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM HZ_CMCR_AFTER_CHANGE WHERE CMCR_CG_ID IN （SELECT ID FROM ( SELECT MAX (CMCR_CG_ID) ID FROM HZ_CMCR_AFTER_CHANGE WHERE CMCR_SRC_PUID IN
#{hzCmcrChange.cmcrSrcPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND CMCR_CHANGE_STATUS = 1 GROUP BY CMCR_SRC_PUID ) T )

select
from( select ,ROWNUM rn from HZ_CMCR_AFTER_CHANGE t WHERE t.CMCR_SRC_PUID=#{cmcrSrcPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.CMCR_CHANGE_ORDER_UID <= #{cmcrCgVwoId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY t.CMCR_CG_ID DESC ) te where te.rn < 3 order by te.CMCR_CG_ID

SELECT
FROM HZ_CMCR_AFTER_CHANGE WHERE CMCR_CG_ID in (SELECT ID FROM (SELECT MAX(CMCR_CG_ID) id,CMCR_SRC_PUID FROM HZ_CMCR_AFTER_CHANGE WHERE CMCR_SRC_PUID IN ( SELECT CMCR_SRC_PUID FROM HZ_CMCR_AFTER_CHANGE WHERE CMCR_CHANGE_ORDER_UID = #{vwoId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) and CMCR_CHANGE_STATUS=1 GROUP BY CMCR_SRC_PUID) t )

select
from HZ_CMCR_AFTER_CHANGE where CMCR_CHANGE_ORDER_UID=#{vwoId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ROWNUM<(select (count(*)/2+1) from HZ_CMCR_AFTER_CHANGE where CMCR_CHANGE_ORDER_UID=#{vwoId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

select
from( select ,ROWNUM rn from HZ_CMCR_AFTER_CHANGE where CMCR_CHANGE_ORDER_UID=#{vwoId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) where rn>(select (count(*)/2) from HZ_CMCR_AFTER_CHANGE where CMCR_CHANGE_ORDER_UID=#{vwoId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

SELECT
FROM HZ_CMCR_AFTER_CHANGE WHERE CMCR_CG_ID in (SELECT ID FROM (SELECT MAX(CMCR_CG_ID) id,CMCR_SRC_PUID FROM HZ_CMCR_AFTER_CHANGE WHERE CMCR_SRC_PUID IN ( SELECT CMCR_SRC_PUID FROM HZ_CMCR_AFTER_CHANGE WHERE CMCR_CHANGE_ORDER_UID = #{vwoId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) and CMCR_CHANGE_STATUS=0 GROUP BY CMCR_SRC_PUID) t )
